home.home: Welcome to SznCycling! Some stupid text for example.
text: SznCycling is a project aimed at showing Szczecin from the cyclist's side. You will find here video recordings of my bicycle trips around Szczecin and the surrounding area.

about.title: About
text: I started my camera + bicycle romance for safety reasons. Through several years of cycling around Szczecin I had few dangerous incidents. Most of them were the fault of careless car drivers. After another such case, I mounted the camera on the bicycle as a "black box". It was in the spring of 2018.

Few months later I came up with an idea to archive all these videos. Szczecin and its infrastructure have been changing quite dynamically in recent months so I thought the movies would be a good documentation of this. I plan to make some changes here in the near future and I will share more videos of my tours.

contact.title: Contact
text: Hi! My name is Piotr Kędziora and I built this website. I'm a web developer and I'm a big sports fan. Running and cycling - this is my way of spending free time.
Have any questions? Did you find a bug on the page? Do you have an idea for an interesting bike trip? Do you have a problem with your website? You can contact me below.
